1: וַיְהִ֗י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> בְּאַחַ֤ת <sup>259 </sup> <n>[month] in the first</n> עֶשְׂרֵה֙ <sup>6240 </sup> <n>ten</n> שָׁנָ֔ה <sup>8141 </sup> <n>year</n> בַּשְּׁלִישִׁ֖י <sup>7992 </sup> <n>in the third</n> בְּאֶחָ֣ד <sup>259 </sup> <n>the first</n> לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <sup>2320 </sup> <n>[day] of the month</n> הָיָ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> דְבַר־ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>[that] the word</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> אֵלַ֥י <sup>413 </sup> <n>to me</n> לֵאמֹֽר׃ <sup>559 </sup> <n>came unto me saying</n>
2: בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>Son</n> אָדָ֕ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>of man</n> אֱמֹ֛ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>speak</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> פַּרְעֹ֥ה <sup>6547 </sup> <n>unto Pharaoh</n> מֶֽלֶךְ־ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>king</n> מִצְרַ֖יִם <sup>4714 </sup> <n>of Egypt</n> וְאֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>and to</n> הֲמוֹנ֑וֹ <sup>1995 </sup> <n>and to his multitude</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> מִ֖י <sup>4310 </sup> <n>are you</n> דָּמִ֥יתָ <sup>1819 </sup> <n>Whom art thou like</n> בְגָדְלֶֽךָ׃ <sup>1433 </sup> <n>greatness</n>
3: הִנֵּ֨ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Behold</n> אַשּׁ֜וּר <sup>804 </sup> <n>Behold the Assyrian</n> אֶ֣רֶז <sup>730 </sup> <n>[was] a cedar</n> בַּלְּבָנ֗וֹן <sup>3844 </sup> <n>in Lebanon</n> יְפֵ֥ה <sup>3303 </sup> <n>with fair</n> עָנָ֛ף <sup>6057 </sup> <n>branches</n> וְחֹ֥רֶשׁ <sup>2793 </sup> <n>shroud</n> מֵצַ֖ל <sup>6751 </sup> <n>and with a shadowing</n> וּגְבַ֣הּ <sup>1362 </sup> <n>and of an high</n> קוֹמָ֑ה <sup>6967 </sup> <n>stature</n> וּבֵ֣ין <sup>996 </sup> <n>was among</n> עֲבֹתִ֔ים <sup>5688 </sup> <n>was among the thick boughs</n> הָיְתָ֖ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> צַמַּרְתּֽוֹ׃ <sup>6788 </sup> <n>and his top</n>
4: מַ֣יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>The waters</n> גִּדְּל֔וּהוּ <sup>1431 </sup> <n>made him great</n> תְּה֖וֹם <sup>8415 </sup> <n>the deep</n> רֹֽמְמָ֑תְהוּ <sup>7311 </sup> <n>set him up on high</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> נַהֲרֹתֶ֗יהָ <sup>5104 </sup> <n>with her rivers</n> הֹלֵךְ֙ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>running</n> סְבִיב֣וֹת <sup>5439 </sup> <n>round about</n> מַטָּעָ֔הּ <sup>4302 </sup> <n>his plants</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> תְּעָלֹתֶ֣יהָ <sup>8585 </sup> <n>her little rivers</n> שִׁלְחָ֔ה <sup>7971 </sup> <n>and sent out</n> אֶ֖ל <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> עֲצֵ֥י <sup>6086 </sup> <n>unto all the trees</n> הַשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <sup>7704 </sup> <n>of the field</n>
5: עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> כֵּן֙ <sup>3651 </sup> <n>after that</n> גָּבְהָ֣א <sup>1361 </sup> <n>was exalted</n> קֹמָת֔וֹ <sup>6967 </sup> <n>Therefore his height</n> מִכֹּ֖ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> עֲצֵ֣י <sup>6086 </sup> <n>above all the trees</n> הַשָּׂדֶ֑ה <sup>7704 </sup> <n>of the field</n> וַתִּרְבֶּ֨ינָה <sup>7235 </sup> <n>were multiplied</n> סַֽרְעַפֹּתָ֜יו <sup>5634 </sup> <n>and his boughs</n> וַתֶּאֱרַ֧כְנָה <sup>748 </sup> <n>became long</n> [פֹארֹתֹו כ] (פֹארֹתָ֛יו <sup>6288 </sup> <n>bough</n> ק) מִמַּ֥יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>of waters</n> רַבִּ֖ים <sup>7227 </sup> <n>because of the multitude</n> בְּשַׁלְּחֽוֹ׃ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>when he shot forth</n>
6: בִּסְעַפֹּתָ֤יו <sup>5589 </sup> <n>in his boughs</n> קִֽנְנוּ֙ <sup>7077 </sup> <n>made their nests</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> ע֣וֹף <sup>5775 </sup> <n>All the fowls</n> הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>of heaven</n> וְתַ֤חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>and under</n> פֹּֽארֹתָיו֙ <sup>6288 </sup> <n>and under his branches</n> יָֽלְד֔וּ <sup>3205 </sup> <n>bring forth their young</n> כֹּ֖ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> חַיַּ֣ת <sup>2416 </sup> <n>did all the beasts</n> הַשָּׂדֶ֑ה <sup>7704 </sup> <n>of the field</n> וּבְצִלּוֹ֙ <sup>6738 </sup> <n>and under his shadow</n> יֵֽשְׁב֔וּ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>dwelt</n> כֹּ֖ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> גּוֹיִ֥ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>nations</n> רַבִּֽים׃ <sup>7227 </sup> <n>all great</n>
7: וַיְּיִ֣ף <sup>3302 </sup> <n>Thus was he fair</n> בְּגָדְל֔וֹ <sup>1433 </sup> <n>in his greatness</n> בְּאֹ֖רֶךְ <sup>753 </sup> <n>in the length</n> דָּֽלִיּוֹתָ֑יו <sup>1808 </sup> <n>of his branches</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> הָיָ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>extended</n> שָׁרְשׁ֖וֹ <sup>8328 </sup> <n>for his root</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> מַ֥יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>waters</n> רַבִּֽים׃ <sup>7227 </sup> <n>was by great</n>
8: אֲרָזִ֣ים <sup>730 </sup> <n>The cedars</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> עֲמָמֻהוּ֮ <sup>6004 </sup> <n>could not hide</n> בְּגַן־ <sup>1588 </sup> <n>in the garden</n> אֱלֹהִים֒ <sup>430 </sup> <n>of God</n> בְּרוֹשִׁ֗ים <sup>1265 </sup> <n>him the fir trees</n> לֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> דָמוּ֙ <sup>1819 </sup> <n>were not like</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>with</n> סְעַפֹּתָ֔יו <sup>5589 </sup> <n>his boughs</n> וְעַרְמֹנִ֥ים <sup>6196 </sup> <n>and the chesnut trees</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> הָי֖וּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> כְּפֹֽארֹתָ֑יו <sup>6288 </sup> <n>were not like his branches</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all manner</n> עֵץ֙ <sup>6086 </sup> <n>nor any tree</n> בְּגַן־ <sup>1588 </sup> <n>in the garden</n> אֱלֹהִ֔ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>of God</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>could</n> דָמָ֥ה <sup>1819 </sup> <n>was like</n> אֵלָ֖יו <sup>413 </sup> <n>in</n> בְּיָפְיֽוֹ׃ <sup>3308 </sup> <n>unto him in his beauty</n>
9: יָפֶ֣ה <sup>3303 </sup> <n>him fair</n> עֲשִׂיתִ֔יו <sup>6213 </sup> <n>I have made</n> בְּרֹ֖ב <sup>7230 </sup> <n>by the multitude</n> דָּֽלִיּוֹתָ֑יו <sup>1808 </sup> <n>of his branches</n> וַיְקַנְאֻ֙הוּ֙ <sup>7065 </sup> <n>envied</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> עֲצֵי־ <sup>6086 </sup> <n>so that all the trees</n> עֵ֔דֶן <sup>5731 </sup> <n>of Eden</n> אֲשֶׁ֖ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> בְּגַ֥ן <sup>1588 </sup> <n>that [were] in the garden</n> הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <sup>430 </sup> <n>of God</n> ס
10: לָכֵ֗ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>Therefore</n> כֹּ֤ה <sup>3541 </sup> <n>thus</n> אָמַר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>Therefore thus saith</n> אֲדֹנָ֣י <sup>136 </sup> <n>the Lord</n> יְהוִ֔ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>GOD</n> יַ֕עַן <sup>3282 </sup> <n>because</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>it</n> גָּבַ֖הְתָּ <sup>1361 </sup> <n>Because thou hast lifted up</n> בְּקוֹמָ֑ה <sup>6967 </sup> <n>thyself in height</n> וַיִּתֵּ֤ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and he hath shot up</n> צַמַּרְתּוֹ֙ <sup>6788 </sup> <n>his top</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> בֵּ֣ין <sup>996 </sup> <n>among</n> עֲבוֹתִ֔ים <sup>5688 </sup> <n>among the thick boughs</n> וְרָ֥ם <sup>7311 </sup> <n>is lifted up</n> לְבָב֖וֹ <sup>3824 </sup> <n>and his heart</n> בְּגָבְהֽוֹ׃ <sup>1363 </sup> <n>in his height</n>
11: וְאֶ֨תְּנֵ֔הוּ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>I have therefore delivered</n> בְּיַ֖ד <sup>3027 </sup> <n>him into the hand</n> אֵ֣יל <sup>410 </sup> <n>of the mighty one</n> גּוֹיִ֑ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>of the heathen</n> עָשׂ֤וֹ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>he shall surely</n> יַֽעֲשֶׂה֙ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>deal</n> ל֔וֹ כְּרִשְׁע֖וֹ <sup>7562 </sup> <n>for his wickedness</n> גֵּרַשְׁתִּֽהוּ׃ <sup>1644 </sup> <n>with him I have driven him out</n>
12: וַיִּכְרְתֻ֧הוּ <sup>3772 </sup> <n>have cut him off</n> זָרִ֛ים <sup>2114 </sup> <n>And strangers</n> עָרִיצֵ֥י <sup>6184 </sup> <n>the terrible</n> גוֹיִ֖ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>of the nations</n> וַֽיִּטְּשֻׁ֑הוּ <sup>5203 </sup> <n>and have left</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>on</n> הֶ֠הָרִים <sup>2022 </sup> <n>him upon the mountains</n> וּבְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> גֵּ֨אָי֜וֹת <sup>1516 </sup> <n>and in all the valleys</n> נָפְל֣וּ <sup>5307 </sup> <n>are fallen</n> דָלִיּוֹתָ֗יו <sup>1808 </sup> <n>his branches</n> וַתִּשָּׁבַ֤רְנָה <sup>7665 </sup> <n>are broken</n> פֹֽארֹתָיו֙ <sup>6288 </sup> <n>and his boughs</n> בְּכֹל֙ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> אֲפִיקֵ֣י <sup>650 </sup> <n>by all the rivers</n> הָאָ֔רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the land</n> וַיֵּרְד֧וּ <sup>3381 </sup> <n>are gone down</n> מִצִּלּ֛וֹ <sup>6738 </sup> <n>from his shadow</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> עַמֵּ֥י <sup>5971 </sup> <n>and all the people</n> הָאָ֖רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the earth</n> וַֽיִּטְּשֻֽׁהוּ׃ <sup>5203 </sup> <n>and have left</n>
13: עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> מַפַּלְתּ֥וֹ <sup>4658 </sup> <n>Upon his ruin</n> יִשְׁכְּנ֖וּ <sup>7931 </sup> <n>remain</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> ע֣וֹף <sup>5775 </sup> <n>shall all the fowls</n> הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>of the heaven</n> וְאֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>will be on</n> פֹּארֹתָ֣יו <sup>6288 </sup> <n>shall be upon his branches</n> הָי֔וּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> כֹּ֖ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> חַיַּ֥ת <sup>2416 </sup> <n>and all the beasts</n> הַשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <sup>7704 </sup> <n>of the field</n>

15: כֹּֽה־ <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> אָמַ֞ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Thus saith</n> אֲדֹנָ֣י <sup>136 </sup> <n>the Lord</n> יְהוִ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>GOD</n> בְּי֨וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>In the day</n> רִדְתּ֤וֹ <sup>3381 </sup> <n>when he went down</n> שְׁא֙וֹלָה֙ <sup>7585 </sup> <n>to the grave</n> הֶאֱבַ֜לְתִּי <sup>56 </sup> <n>I caused a mourning</n> כִּסֵּ֤תִי <sup>3680 </sup> <n>I covered</n> עָלָיו֙ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> תְּה֔וֹם <sup>8415 </sup> <n>the deep</n> וָֽאֶמְנַע֙ <sup>4513 </sup> <n>for him and I restrained</n> נַהֲרוֹתֶ֔יהָ <sup>5104 </sup> <n>the floods</n> וַיִּכָּלְא֖וּ <sup>3607 </sup> <n>were stayed</n> מַ֣יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>waters</n> רַבִּ֑ים <sup>7227 </sup> <n>thereof and the great</n> וָאַקְדִּ֤ר <sup>6937 </sup> <n>to mourn</n> עָלָיו֙ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>account</n> לְבָנ֔וֹן <sup>3844 </sup> <n>and I caused Lebanon</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> עֲצֵ֥י <sup>6086 </sup> <n>for him and all the trees</n> הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <sup>7704 </sup> <n>of the field</n> עָלָ֥יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> עֻלְפֶּֽה׃ <sup>5969 </sup> <n>fainted</n>
16: מִקּ֤וֹל <sup>6963 </sup> <n>at the sound</n> מַפַּלְתּוֹ֙ <sup>4658 </sup> <n>of his fall</n> הִרְעַ֣שְׁתִּי <sup>7493 </sup> <n>to shake</n> גוֹיִ֔ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>I made the nations</n> בְּהוֹרִדִ֥י <sup>3381 </sup> <n>when I cast him down</n> אֹת֛וֹ <sup>853 </sup> שְׁא֖וֹלָה <sup>7585 </sup> <n>to hell</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> י֣וֹרְדֵי <sup>3381 </sup> <n>with them that descend</n> ב֑וֹר <sup>953 </sup> <n>into the pit</n> וַיִּנָּ֨חֲמ֜וּ <sup>5162 </sup> <n>shall be comforted</n> בְּאֶ֤רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the earth</n> תַּחְתִּית֙ <sup>8482 </sup> <n>in the nether parts</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> עֲצֵי־ <sup>6086 </sup> <n>and all the trees</n> עֵ֔דֶן <sup>5731 </sup> <n>of Eden</n> מִבְחַ֥ר <sup>4005 </sup> <n>the choice</n> וְטוֹב־ <sup>2896 </sup> <n>and best</n> לְבָנ֖וֹן <sup>3844 </sup> <n>of Lebanon</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> שֹׁ֥תֵי <sup>8354 </sup> <n>all that drink</n> מָֽיִם׃ <sup>4325 </sup> <n>water</n>
17: גַּם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>also</n> הֵ֗ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> אִתּ֛וֹ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> יָרְד֥וּ <sup>3381 </sup> <n>They also went down</n> שְׁא֖וֹלָה <sup>7585 </sup> <n>into hell</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> חַלְלֵי־ <sup>2491 </sup> <n>with him unto [them that be] slain</n> חָ֑רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>with the sword</n> וּזְרֹע֛וֹ <sup>2220 </sup> <n>and [they that were] his arm</n> יָשְׁב֥וּ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>[that] dwelt</n> בְצִלּ֖וֹ <sup>6738 </sup> <n>under his shadow</n> בְּת֥וֹךְ <sup>8432 </sup> <n>in the midst</n> גּוֹיִֽם׃ <sup>1471 </sup> <n>of the heathen</n>
18: אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> מִ֨י <sup>4310 </sup> <n>which</n> דָמִ֥יתָ <sup>1819 </sup> <n>To whom art thou thus like</n> כָּ֛כָה <sup>3602 </sup> <n>thus</n> בְּכָב֥וֹד <sup>3519 </sup> <n>in glory</n> וּבְגֹ֖דֶל <sup>1433 </sup> <n>and in greatness</n> בַּעֲצֵי־ <sup>6086 </sup> <n>among the trees</n> עֵ֑דֶן <sup>5731 </sup> <n>of Eden</n> וְהוּרַדְתָּ֨ <sup>3381 </sup> <n>down</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>with</n> עֲצֵי־ <sup>6086 </sup> <n>with the trees</n> עֵ֜דֶן <sup>5731 </sup> <n>of Eden</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> אֶ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the earth</n> תַּחְתִּ֗ית <sup>8482 </sup> <n>unto the nether parts</n> בְּת֨וֹךְ <sup>8432 </sup> <n>in the midst</n> עֲרֵלִ֤ים <sup>6189 </sup> <n>of the uncircumcised</n> תִּשְׁכַּב֙ <sup>7901 </sup> <n>thou shalt lie</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> חַלְלֵי־ <sup>2491 </sup> <n>with [them that be] slain</n> חֶ֔רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>by the sword</n> ה֤וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> פַרְעֹה֙ <sup>6547 </sup> <n>This [is] Pharaoh</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> הֲמוֹנֹ֔ה <sup>1995 </sup> <n>and all his multitude</n> נְאֻ֖ם <sup>5002 </sup> <n>saith</n> אֲדֹנָ֥י <sup>136 </sup> <n>the Lord</n> יְהוִֽה׃ <sup>3069 </sup> <n>GOD</n> ס
